metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0482 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The contrib.auth.middleware.RemoteUserMiddleware middleware in Django before 1.4.14, 1.5.x before 1.5.9, 1.6.x before 1.6.6, and 1.7 before release candidate 3, when using the contrib.auth.backends.RemoteUserBackend backend, allows remote authenticated users to hijack web sessions via vectors related to the REMOTE_USER header.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0482` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1.6.1-2ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.1-2ubuntu0.4').
